Node.definition: literally to pluck up (the tent pegs); hence: = action by which a relatively large company of humans, together with their possessions, departs from a place where they had set up a temporary residence
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= an area of land located in the south of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples initially by the Canaanites in Arad (עֲרָד) and the Amelekites (עֲמָלֵקִי) later, the people of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= the area separating two or mores locations

= town, also known as En Mishpat (עֵין מִשְׁפָּט) , Kedesh (קֶדֶשׁ) and Kadesh Barnea (קָדֵשׁ בַּרְנֵעַ) ◄ located in the Wilderness of Zin (צִן) in the northern part of Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula; ► Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) encamped there on their way from Egypt (מִצְרַיִם) to Canaan (כְּנַעַן) it is also the location of the Meribah (מְרִיבָה) spring; spies were sent out into Canaan from this place; it later marked the southern border of the territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= the area separating two or mores locations
= location ◄ east of Egypt

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time
= town; ◄ in western Negeb (נֶגֶב) not far from Gaza (עַזָּה) ► inhabited by Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) one of the places where Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and Isaac (יִצְחָק) sojourned

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man, also known as Abram (אַבְרָם) ◄ son of Terah (תֶּרַח) ► first patriarch of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) father of Ishmael (יִשְׁמָעֵאל) and Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= woman, also known as Sarai (שָׂרַי) ► wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and mother of Isaac (יִצְחָק)
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= causative action by which humans or deities send one or more people though the people sent are not mentioned explicitly to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= name or title of man; ► king of Gerar (גְּרָר)
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= town; ◄ in western Negeb (נֶגֶב) not far from Gaza (עַזָּה) ► inhabited by Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) one of the places where Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and Isaac (יִצְחָק) sojourned

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= woman, also known as Sarai (שָׂרַי) ► wife of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and mother of Isaac (יִצְחָק)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= name or title of man; ► king of Gerar (גְּרָר)
= process by which humans perceive a series of pictures and events in their minds; ≈ often regarded as a revelation from God; sometimes associated with things that disappear in a moment
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= a linker introducing a proposition denoting the reason for what precedes
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= action by which a man takes a woman as his lawful wife
= person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband
= name or title of man; ► king of Gerar (גְּרָר)
literally: to approach; hence: = action by which humans have sexual intercourse with others

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
originally a plural construct with first person singular suffix of אָדֹון (אָדֹון) = way of addressing God as master and lord
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which someone or something is without or free from guilt

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= causative action by which humans or deities keep (other) humans from performing a particular event
= marker pointing out that the information that follows represents the logical consequence of what has been stated before
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Node.gloss: to touch (a woman) > to have sex
Node.definition: literally: to touch (a woman); hence: = action by which a man has sexual relations with a woman, either or not consensually
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= silver, usually in the form of small unstamped pieces that had to be weighed in order to determine their value; after the exile, people in Israel started using coins
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: covering; hence: = something that is a visible proof of someone else's innocence in a certain matter

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus

plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= woman who is the legal property of someone else; either married or eligible for marriage; her children belong to the person who owns her; ≈ because of this an אָמָה appears to have a somewhat higher status than a שִׁפְחָה even though both terms are sometimes used interchangeably
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety

= path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space
